ygData.subject: RE: [rest-discuss] Re: ETag on non-existent resources
ygData.msgSnippet: ... If the server guarantees that every variant of the resource will have an ETag, then If-None-Match: *  will do what you want. Regards, Brian

Aristotle Pagaltzis wrote:
> * Jan Vincent <jvliwanag@...> [2009-09-1=
9 00:35]:
> > I was wondering how to do a PUT/POST/DELETE call on a resourc=
e
> > specifying the precondition that it doesn't exist in the first
> > pl=
ace.

If the server guarantees that every variant of the resource will have=
 an ETag, then "If-None-Match: *"  will do what you want.

Regards,
Brian

=
